title: Numbers with Heart: My Journey from Actuarial Tables to Social Impact.
subtitle: Picture an ex-actuary who left risk tables behind to transform social services‚Äîand now wields Python, SQL, and AI to tackle real-world challenges. From building e-commerce dashboards to fine-tuning Transformer models, I bring curiosity, empathy, and an unshakeable drive to innovate. If your team needs a data pro who blends finance-savvy, passion for people, and cutting-edge tech to unleash game-changing insights, I‚Äôm ready to make that happen. Let‚Äôs harness data‚Äîand human dedication‚Äîto create meaningful impact together.

projects.title: BundesRAG Analytics
projects.description: A comprehensive analysis system for German parliamentary speeches (2000-2022) powered by Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG). This cutting-edge platform combines FAISS vector search, SentenceTransformers, and spaCy to transform parliamentary discourse into actionable insights, enabling intelligent exploration and analysis of political discussions.
features: üîç Semantic Search: Advanced context-aware search beyond keywords using FAISS and SentenceTransformers
üìä Real-time Analytics: Dynamic visualization of political trends and party analysis
üéØ Topic Tracking: AI-powered extraction and analysis of topic evolution across time and parties
üîÑ RAG Pipeline: Smart context extraction combining retrieval-based and generative approaches
üåê Multilingual Support: Full support for German and English interfaces
üìà Interactive Dashboard: Real-time data exploration and visualization
üë• Speaker Analysis: Track contributions and themes across parliamentarians

projects.title: Bitcoin Analysis System
projects.description: Developed an automated system using AWS Lambda functions to track Bitcoin prices, collect news, and perform sentiment analysis using Hugging Face LLMs. Includes real-time data pipeline with PostgreSQL integration.
features: Automated data pipeline for Bitcoin price tracking

projects.title: Sales Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive Tableau dashboard providing comprehensive sales analysis with dynamic filtering and real-time visualization capabilities.

projects.title: Project Presentations
projects.description: Collection of detailed project presentations and technical documentation showcasing various data analysis and machine learning implementations.

about.name: FEHMI KATAR
about.title: Data Analyst
about.expertise: Results-driven Data Analyst with over seven years of leadership experience and a strong foundation in risk management. Holds a degree in Actuarial Sciences, combining expertise in finance, mathematics, and statistics to drive data-informed strategies. Expert in data-oriented consulting, leveraging SQL, Python, R, and Tableau to transform complex data into actionable insights.

skills.Python: Data manipulation, machine learning, and predictive modeling using libraries like Pandas, Spacy, NumPy, and Scikit-learn.
skills.SQL: Data querying, database management, complex joins; proficient in writing optimized queries.
skills.Tableau: Data visualization, dashboard creation, and storytelling with data; experienced in creating interactive dashboards.
skills.Git: Collaboration on code projects, version control, and workflow management using Git.
skills.AI & NLP: AI tools like Transformers and Hugging Face for NLP tasks, including text classification, sentiment analysis, and model fine-tuning.

experience.title: Data-Driven Asylum Rights Management
